Export.Routine: LVBCOM8095 ; IG 29/4/98 ; Common routines - conversion for 6.4 q start n ; actions change I to I1 s ts="" f s ts=$o(^TTAB("TS",ts)) q:ts="" d .s cnt="" f s cnt=$o(^TTAB("TS",ts,"ACTION",cnt)) q:cnt="" i $p(^(cnt),"\")="I" s $p(^(cnt),"\")="I1" s cnt="" f s cnt=$o(^TTAB("PE-ACTION",cnt)) q:cnt="" i $p(^(cnt),"\")="I" s $p(^(cnt),"\")="I1" q
